entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning overnight except a few wet flurries over higher terrain. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers changing to periods of drizzle and ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. A few wet flurries over higher terrain in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches developing after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023
